tool_description:
The Verification Suite consists of
-Verification Solution
-User Authentication
-Document Data Extraction
name: IDfy Verification Suite
title: IDfy Verification Suite

api_list.name: GST Certificate Verification
api_list.description: Get GST details using the GSTIN
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://idfy-verification-suite.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/ind_gst_certificate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "idfy-verification-suite.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Vehicle Registration Certificate Verification -Plus (India)
api_list.description:
This API is used to verify Vehicle Registration Certificate (RC) number against Vahan vehicle database. The API allows you to -

Fetch vehicle details registered against an RC number
Find the name of the vehicle’s owner
Check class of vehicle
Verify registration date of the vehicle
The API also provides the option to match the name of vehicle owner that has been captured in a use-case against the name of vehicle owner on the database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://idfy-verification-suite.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/ind_rc_plus"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "idfy-verification-suite.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Indian Document Image Validator
api_list.description:
This endpoint is used to perform real-time validation checks on the ID document submitted by a user. 

These checks are best suited for the following use-cases
- To give the user an immediate feedback in case a wrong or unexpected document is submitted:

- To ascertain the ID type (aadhaar, pan, voter, DL and passport) of an unknown OVD (Officially Valid Document).

- To identify non-readable / blurred documents submitted by the user and provide a real-time feedback within seconds

- To check if face is present on the submitted document
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://idfy-verification-suite.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/validate/document"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "idfy-verification-suite.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Indian Pan Card Data Extraction
api_list.description: Extraction of details from image of an individual or company PAN card in real-time. You can additionally send more details in the request to perform a name match with the extracted fields.

api_list.name: Name compare (sync)
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to compare two names. It consumes two strings in the request body and returns a match score on a scale of 1 to 5.
api_list.code:

url = "https://idfy-verification-suite.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/compare/ind_names"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "idfy-verification-suite.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Face liveness check (sync)
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to check if the face in the image is a picture of a living person or it is a picture of a picture/screen etc.

api_list.name: Face compare (sync)
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to compare two face images. It consumes two images(with a face) in the request body and produces a match score between two faces.

api_list.name: FSSAI License Verification
api_list.description:
Used to verify food and beverage production license issued by India govt. 
This API accepts the FSSAI Registration number as an input and in return verifies if the certificate exists, and verifies the company and Product related details.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://idfy-verification-suite.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/ind_fssai"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "idfy-verification-suite.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Indian Driving License Verification
api_list.description: Our automated DL verification API is used to verify Indian Driving license details with government databases. We will provide output from any one of the sources, depending on the source availability. You will receive the following information (based on the source)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://idfy-verification-suite.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/ind_driving_license"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "idfy-verification-suite.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
